backend/main.mo: Main actor for the backend, defining data types (Electrician, WorkOrder, UserProfile, etc.) and CRUD operations with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization and AccessControl mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Data migration module that upgrades OldWorkOrder records to NewWorkOrder by adding the missing `customerContactNumber` field (defaulting to empty string).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two implemented features: removing the 'actor not available' alert on the Book Service page, and adding a Contact Number input field to the booking form.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated text file containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose and recent changes.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file importing Tailwind directives and defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets the page title to 'Technical Tech' and mounts the React app via the root div and main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component that sets up TanStack Router with all page routes (including a public /my-bookings route), QueryClient, ThemeProvider, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/ApplicationStatu: Renders a styled badge for application process statuses (pending, verified, accepted, declined, cancelled) with appropriate CSS classes and labels.
frontend/src/components/AppSidebar.tsx: Sidebar navigation component rendering Portal and Admin link groups with active-state highlighting, using TanStack Router for navigation.
frontend/src/components/JobApplicationSt: Displays a multi-step progress indicator with a progress bar, step dots, and labels for job application flows.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout wrapping children in a sidebar with a sticky header that includes the logo and an Internet Identity login/logout button.
Simple centered loading spinner component used as a fallback during lazy loading or async operations.
frontend/src/components/PaymentStatusBad: Renders a styled badge for payment statuses (paid or pending) using corresponding CSS classes.
frontend/src/components/PriorityBadge.ts: Renders a styled badge for numeric priority levels 1–4 (Low, Medium, High, Urgent) with corresponding CSS classes.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Guards routes by checking Internet Identity authentication, showing a login prompt or initializing spinner if unauthenticated, otherwise rendering child routes via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/RatingDisplay.ts: Displays a read-only star rating (1–5) with optional review count, supporting small and medium sizes.
frontend/src/components/RatingInput.tsx: Interactive star rating input with hover effects and an optional comment textarea for submitting ratings.
frontend/src/components/StatusBadge.tsx: Renders a styled badge for work order statuses (open, in progress, completed, cancelled) with corresponding CSS classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including CRUD operations for user profiles, electricians, work orders, payments, and job applications using the ICP actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Provides a React context and hook for i18n support, storing the selected language in sessionStorage and resolving translation strings with English fallback.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Exports English and Hindi translation strings organized by feature sections (nav, landing, services, jobBoard, etc.) for use with the translation hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for the dark-themed design system and utility badge classes for statuses, priorities, and payment states.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class merging, label/class resolution for work order statuses, payment statuses, priorities, specialities, and qualifications, plus rating and timestamp formatting helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page that displays summary stats (total/open/completed orders, electricians, revenue) and a recent work orders table using data from React Query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Electricians.tsx: Page component for managing electricians with full CRUD operations (add, edit, delete) via dialogs, displaying a list with ratings, qualifications, and work availability using React Query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/JobBoard.tsx: Public job board page that lists open work orders, supports search filtering, allows authenticated users to apply for jobs, and provides job alert subscription functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with a hero banner, feature highlights, and service category cards that navigate users to the services or jobs pages.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookings.tsx: User-facing bookings page that displays the current user's work orders split into ongoing and past, with accept/decline actions for verified-pending orders.
frontend/src/pages/Payments.tsx: Admin payments page showing summary stats (total revenue, pending amounts, paid/pending counts) and a list of work orders with an edit dialog to update payment amount, method, and status.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: React page for booking a service, allowing users to select a service type, fill in contact/payment details, and submit a work order via the createWorkOrder mutation.
frontend/src/pages/WorkOrders.tsx: React page for viewing and managing work orders, supporting status updates, accept/decline actions, verification, and rating submissions via tabbed/dialog UI.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, using sessionStorage for persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking existing features and pending action requests, specifically to remove the 'actor not available' alert and add a contact number field to the book service form.
